name: "The Embers of Cinder City"
description: A finely crafted stone model, said to be a replica of certain devices aboard the "Tonatiuh." While it lacks the functionality of the original as a "key," the radiance at its pinnacle still shines brilliantly — truly exquisite.\nThe Tonatiuh may have undergone numerous transformations and voids, much like the embers after a fire, but hope remains, flickering within — much like how the light atop continues to glow, never extinguished...
